meanings.definition: Relating to the practice of cooking and eating good food.
meanings.sent1: The gastronomical event featured a variety of delicious dishes.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the gastronomical delights of the new restaurant in town.
meanings.sent3: The gastronomical competition was fierce, with chefs showcasing their best recipes.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for gastronomical adventures led her to explore different cuisines.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the gastronomical feast filled the room, tempting everyone's taste buds.

meanings.sent1: The gastronomical magazine featured articles on food trends.
meanings.sent2: He attended a gastronomical workshop to learn about food pairings.
meanings.sent3: The gastronomical tour of the city introduced unique culinary experiences.
meanings.sent4: Her gastronomical knowledge impressed the guests at the dinner party.
meanings.sent5: The gastronomical discussions at the food conference sparked new ideas for chefs.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the art or science of good eating.
meanings.sent1: His gastronomical skills in the kitchen were admired by his friends.
meanings.sent2: The gastronomical principles he followed resulted in exquisite meals.
meanings.sent3: She approached the recipe with a gastronomical mindset, focusing on flavors.
meanings.sent4: The gastronomical approach to nutrition emphasized balanced meals.
meanings.sent5: The gastronomical journey through different cuisines broadened her culinary horizons.
